name: Infopulse Ukraine
tag_list: it-outsourcing, offshore-software-development, it-nearshore, mobile-development, android-development, iphone-development, software-testing, augmented-reality
overview:
Infopulse Ukraine offers the full array of IT lifecycle services. Company develops IT products, maintain the IT infrastructures in which these products or the ones produced by other companies may function.

Services portfolio includes:

Software Development; Software Testing; IT Operation Services; Virtualization, Software Packaging, and Scripting; Telecommunications Infrastructure Maintenance; IT Security Management
